description: PhylomeDB is a database of complete phylomes derived for different genomes within a specific taxonomic range. It provides alignments, phylogentic trees and tree-based orthology predictions for all encoded proteins.
name: PhylomeDB

resources.description: PhylomeDB at Centro de Investigación Príncipe Felipe

institution.description: The Centre for Genomic Regulation (CRG) is an international biomedical research institute of excellence, created in December 2000. It is a non-profit foundation funded by the Catalan Government through the Departments of Business & Knowledge, the Spanish Ministry of Science, Innovation & Universities, the "la Caixa" Banking Foundation, and includes the participation of Pompeu Fabra University.
institution.name: Centre for Genomic Regulation

resources.name: PhylomeDB at Centro de Investigación Príncipe Felipe
